titleStmt.title: At the dravving-school near the Hand and Pen in St. Paul's church-yard, is taught the art of drawing: on Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays in the morning from eight to eleven; for five shillings entrance and five shillings a month. Also on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays in the evening from six to nine: at the said place on the same terms. Those that please may be taught at their respective habitations. By B. Lens, and J. Sturt.
titleStmt.author: Lens, Bernard, 1659-1725.
Sturt, John, 1658-1730.

notesStmt.note: At end of text: This paper may be had at the school. 1697.
